text: Bernalillo County is the most populous county in the U.S. state of New Mexico.Bernalillo County from the website of the New Mexico Office of the State Historian As of the 2020 census, the population was 676,444. The county seat, Albuquerque, is the most populous city in New Mexico. ==References== Category:New Mexico counties Category:1850s establishments in New Mexico Territory Category:1852 establishments in the United States
title: Bernalillo County, New Mexico
